items.typeLine: Saturated Eternal Life Flask of Assuaging
explicitMods:
Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 15 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 15 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

implicitMods: 10% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 1860 additional Armour
You and nearby allies gain 49% more Armour
You and nearby Allies gain 1% of Evasion Rating as Extra Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff giving more poison damage and a chance to inflict poison. When you poison an enemy while you have this buff, you gain Virulence, and summon an Agony Crawler minion that uses projectile and area attacks. You will lose Virulence over time, at a rate which increases the more Virulence you have. The minion will die when you have no Virulence.
explicitMods: Buff grants 40% chance to Poison on Hit
Grants Virulence when you Poison an Enemy
Buff grants 10% more Damage with Poison
Agony Crawler has 4% increased Attack Speed per Virulence you have
Agony Crawler deals 9% increased Physical Damage per Virulence you have
Agony Crawler has 36 to 67 Added Physical Damage per Virulence you have
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2115 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 28% more Evasion rating
You and nearby Allies have 1% chance to Avoid Chaos Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Woe Thread
explicitMods: 35% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

socketedItems.name: Foul Lens
explicitMods: Adds 11 to 14 Chaos Damage to Spells
14 to 16 Added Spell Chaos Damage while holding a Shield
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Taste of Hate
explicitMods: 15% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 13% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

items.name: Circle of Nostalgia
explicitMods: 70% increased Chaos Damage while affected by Herald of Agony
flavourText: I was a happy child, before the cruel truth was revealed to me.
I fight so that the children may remain ignorant.

items.typeLine: Alchemist's Topaz Flask of the Order
craftedMods: 25% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Vixen's Entrapment
explicitMods: Trigger Socketed Curse Spell when you Cast a Curse Spell, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
0.2% of Spell Damage Leeched as Energy Shield for each Curse on Enemy
You can apply an additional Curse
Curse Skills have 20% increased Cast Speed
flavourText: "One coy look. One blown kiss. One word spoken.
One night I wish I'd forget."

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to be debilitated when they hit enemies and increasing damage they take while on low life.
explicitMods: Cursed Enemies take 58% increased Damage while on Low Life
Cursed Enemies are Debilitated for 2.00 Seconds when they Hit
11% of Overkill Damage from Killing Blows on Cursed Enemies is Reflected to other Enemies as Physical Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that apply an effect to an area around a targeted location. Cannot support Vaal skills or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: 134 to 200 Base Off Hand Physical Damage
5 to 7 Added Physical Damage per 15 Armour or Evasion Rating on Shield
75% increased Stun Threshold reduction on enemies at Maximum charge distance
100% more Damage with Hits at Maximum Charge Distance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Reserves mana to apply a buff and leave afterimages of your recent past. Cast the spell again to return to the oldest afterimage, teleporting to that location as well as resetting your Life, Mana and Energy Shield to the values they had then.
explicitMods: Buff grants 5% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
This Spell's Cast Speed cannot be modified
Buff makes you Unaffected by Temporal Chains
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed

items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

items.name: The Eternal Struggle
explicitMods: Critical Strikes inflict Malignant Madness if The Eater of Worlds is dominant
Kill Enemies that have 15% or lower Life on Hit if The Searing Exarch is dominant
flavourText: Simply the way it must be, so that existence may be.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.
